title: Sayonara

en: Hey, #NAME. I just came by to say... goodbye, really.
You aren't the same person I used to know. You've become really stingy, and grumpy, and stressed...
We barely saw each other last month. I kinda thought I meant more to you than that. I'm going to stay out of your hair, since that's clearly what you want from me.

yes_caption: Takashi, what are you talking about?
no_caption: Yeah, Ok. Well, maybe I just grew up a little. You could try doing the same.

en: You know, sometimes people change. Circumstances change.
I guess we're just at different points in our lives.
